Review Name: Very Good Review Description: I am very happy with the product configuration and how the packaging is.. Ekart you always delivery your best as a courier partner to Flipkart. Omniretail you also rocks with the proper and exact product delivery.. But I am unhappy with the vendor who have taken to install this AC at my home place. One star reduced because of that as they are not well trained to install the AC. Else all were awesome..
